      • getUserByUsername

        public User getUserByUsername(java.lang.String name)
        Return a user that matches the username.
        Remember that usernames should be unique, we will need to check that we arent adding two users with the same username. There may exist more than one user with this username in the system, this function will only return ONE. All bets are off as to which one.
        Parameters:
        name -
        Returns:
        User

      • getTaskById

        public Task getTaskById(int taskId)
        Return a task with a matching Task ID.
        Remember that there should only be ONE task with a certain TaskID this method will only return 1 Task even if multiple tasks are found
        Parameters:
        taskId -
        Returns:
        Task
